mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.cust_name as t_cust_name, t.cust_code as t_cust_code, t.cust_parent as t_cust_parent, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.update_time as t_update_time, t.state as t_state
mapper.insert: insert into customer (id, cust_name, cust_code, cust_parent, create_time, update_time, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into customer
id,
cust_name,
cust_code,
cust_parent,
create_time,
update_time,
state,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update customer
cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_code = #{custCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_parent = #{custParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update customer set cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_code = #{custCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_parent = #{custParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
